data.title: Wolf and Best Clothes
data.description: A merchant named Lawrence encounters Holo, a girl with the ears and tail of a wolf. An ancient goddess who longs to return to her northern home, she joins Lawrence in his travels.

data.title: Wolf and Distant Past
data.description: Lawrence and Holo meet a young merchant who shares a scheme he hopes will bring profit. Holo teaches Lawrence how to relate to folks who may wish to deceive.

data.title: Wolf and Business Talent
data.description: Holo's wily charm helps Lawrence get a great price in a fur trade, and the money exchanging scheme might be too good to be true.

data.title: Wolf and Her Helpless Partner
data.description: Following an ambush by business competitors, Lawrence receives a letter which holds disturbing information regarding Holos plight.

data.title: Wolf and Lovers' Quarrel
data.description: In the midst of rescuing Holo, Lawrence learns that the face behind the recent shady dealings is very familiar.

data.title: Wolf and Silent Farewell
data.next_episode_title: Wolf and a Tail of Happiness
data.description: Lawrence and Holo might be separated for good after the untamed girl unleashes her powers to defeat a threat lurking beneath the city.

data.title: Wolf and a Tail of Happiness
data.description: Lawrence uses his crafty business sense (while Holo utilizes her considerable charisma) to get a great deal on some expensive clothes.
Amid rumors of danger ahead, Holo and Lawrence move on after exposing a swindler. The next soul encountered on the road north makes the little wolf very uneasy.
data.title: Wolf and Virtuous Scales
Wolf and the Shepherd's Lamb
data.description: After arriving in the next town, an old friend greets Lawrence warmly. But Holo is uneasy with their newest traveling companion.

data.title: Wolf and the Swirling Plot
data.next_episode_title: Wolf and the Biggest Secret Scheme
data.description: Lawrence is suddenly burdened with a large amount of debt. If he doesnt find a way out of the situation, he could lose more than his business.

data.next_episode_title: Wolf and a Group of Youngsters
data.description: Lawrence and Holo devise a plan to relieve their debt and must attempt to persuade the shepherd to take part in the risky scheme.
data.title: Wolf and the Biggest Secret Scheme
Wolf and a Group of Youngsters
data.description: Just as it looks like the smuggling plot will succeed, Lawrence learns a hard truth about wolves in sheeps clothing.
Lawrence settles the score with those who betrayed him and finds that even in a life based on profit and debt, some things are more valuable than others.
data.title: Wolf and a New Beginning
